name: Gasthaus Zimmereben 853m
description:
Summer 
24. March till end of October 2017 
Tuesday rest day 
no overnight stay possible

We are the perfect location for you to rest and unwind. Treat yourself to something delicious on the sunny terrace and enjoy the magnificent views of Mayrhofen and the Zillertal valley. For your dining pleasure, we are happy to provide a variety of homemade delicacies.
In addition to the cottage is a lovingly designed playground. Perhaps there is also somethign interesting to discover in the surrounding forest.
